name: Ace
description: You gain skill focus with any two Pilot’s fields of study.

name: Acrobatic
description: Skill focus in Acrobatics field of study, plus Kick Up, Up the Wall, Free Running abilities.

name: Additional Origin
description: You gain an additional origin (restrictions and advancement only). Editor-in-Chief approval required.

name: Animal Affinity
description: Skill focus in Animal Handling (Training), advantage on Empathy checks with animals, and can calm/scare them.

name: Attack Focus
description: +1 attack, +2 damage with a chosen attack. Can be taken multiple times for different attacks.

name: Blind-Fighting
description: No disadvantage or enemy advantage when blind and can retaliate if missed by a concealed attacker.

name: Burglar
description: Skill focus in Larceny, +1 to bypass electronic security. +2 if focused in Technology (security systems).

name: Captivating Performer
description: Skill focus in Performance field and gain Inspiring Performance maneuver.

name: Combat Intuition
description: Immune to outnumbering penalties.

name: Critical Precision
description: Chosen attack crits on 19–20.

name: Daredevil
description: +5 bonus when failing a check causes physical harm; may gain advantage for heroic actions.

name: Disciplined
description: +1 Willpower defense, advantage vs. mental control and psychosis (if used).

name: Diehard
description: Recover Stamina once per rest with Con roll + 2×Rank.

name: Eclectic Knowledge
description: Skill focus in two Academic fields.

name: Engineering Prodigy
description: Skill focus in two Engineering fields.

name: Empathic Intuition
description: Skill focus in Empathy; calm agitated targets via skill check.

name: Escape Artist Extraordinaire
description: Skill focus in Escape Artist; escape normal restraints 1/rest without check.

name: Exceptional Scavenger
description: Skill focus in Scavenge field; start each issue with 6 APs of gear.

name: Gearhead
description: Skill focus in Engineering (Auto Repair), +2 to Drive checks.

name: Hacker
description: Skill focus in Technology (Computer Hacking), half-time hacking, +2 to hacking checks.

name: Hawkeye
description: No range penalties within Wisdom areas; ranged attacks ignore partial cover.

name: Healing Hands
description: Skill focus in two Medicine fields; revive an ally from 0 stamina 1/scene.

name: Hidden Stash
description: Find hidden stash 1/rest. Stashes have gear/AP. Plot point expands uses.

name: Honeyed Tongue
description: Skill focus in Influence field; +2 to detect lies or persuade.

name: Horse Whisperer
description: Skill focus in Animal Handling (Riding); +2 to ride/care/train horses.

name: Hunter
description: Skill focus in two Outdoorsman fields.

name: I've Done Alright for Myself
description: Skill focus in Urban Survival field; gain a vehicle or horse and start each issue with 4 APs.

name: Jury Rigging
description: Skill focus in Basic Engineering; ignore penalties for DC ≤ 20.

name: Learn Maneuver
description: Learn a maneuver you qualify for.

name: Martial Artist
description: Choose a stance each turn (Precision, Powerful, Quick) for unarmed combat.

name: Mind Over Body
description: Use Willpower defense once/scene in place of Avoidance/Fortitude.

name: Natural Born Leader
description: Learn two leadership maneuvers, ignoring prerequisites.

name: Night Owl
description: Need only 4 hours of sleep in 1hr chunks. +5 to passive Perception while asleep.

name: Occult Scholar
description: Skill focus in Occult field; +2 to identify arcane symbols and magic.

name: Owl Eyed
description: Skill focus in Perception; +5 passive Perception.

name: Perfect Aim
description: +1 to hit with ranged attacks; once/scene gain Advantage on a ranged attack.

name: Political Maneuvering
description: Replace ally’s failed check with Influence (Charisma) once/scene.

name: Polyglot
description: Skill focus in Linguistics; learn 3 additional languages.

name: Quick
description: +1 Avoidance and +1 walking pace.

name: Seasoned Survivor
description: Skill focus in Local Knowledge field, +2 to Urban Survival in known city.

name: Sidekick
description: Choose a bystander and upgrade them to an Upstart character.

name: Sharp Eyes
description: +2 to Perception to detect traps/ambushes.

name: Skill Focus
description: Gain skill focus in any trained skill’s field or the whole skill.

name: Shield Expert
description: +1 Avoidance with shield; can throw shield and return; bonus shove action.

name: Stealthy
description: Skill focus in Stealth; move at full speed while hiding.

name: Street Magic
description: Skill focus in Prestidigitation field; +2 to tricks or subtle object manipulation.

name: Scientific Mind
description: Skill focus in two Science fields.

name: Supporting Characters
description: Both bystanders are upgraded to supporting characters.

name: Technological Savant
description: Skill focus in two Technology fields.

name: Technophile
description: Skill focus in Basic Technology; no penalties for DC ≤ 20.

name: Third Eye
description: +2 to detect invisible or hidden powers.

name: Toughness
description: +1 Fortitude and +10 Max Stamina. May take twice for 1 wound.

name: Uncanny Reaction
description: Take two reactions per round.

name: Unique Device
description: Gain a custom item with power-level bonuses. May tie to Removable power.

name: Visionary
description: Skill focus in 3 Engineering fields. Can repair removable-powered gear.
prerequisite: Intelligence 15+, Basic Engineering, Engineering skill focus ×3

name: Wary
description: +2 initiative; Advantage 1/rest on initiative.

name: Waylay
description: Deal bonus damage from surprise. Can take multiple times for different weapons.

name: Weapon Master
description: +1 to hit, +2 damage with one weapon type. Can be taken multiple times.

name: Wheelman
description: Skill focus in two Drive fields; +2 to Drive checks in combat.
